item.description: Photo by Vanna Phon on Unsplash Getting Started with Envoy & Open Policy Agent — 09 — Learn how to use Envoy & OPA to sign and validate HTTP Requests This is the 9th Envoy & Open Policy Agent Getting Started Guide.
